Parliament of Harlon

The Parliament of Harlon is a bicameral Parliament consisting of the House of Assembly, the lower house, and the Senate, the upper house. The Parliament writes, debates and votes on proposed legislation.

The Speaker
Talk with government officials, apply for government jobs and view the latest updates from the Government of Harlon.
